question: Tell me about a time you went above and beyond for a customer or end-user.
user_input: During my internship, I noticed a critical issue reported by a user that our ticketing system had marked as low priority. I manually investigated the logs and identified it as a security loophole affecting multiple users. I worked over the weekend to develop a patch and coordinated with the deployment team to roll it out early. The customer appreciated the fast turnaround and our team was recognized internally.
